directions: Heat frying pan until hot, then add sesame oil and sauté ginger until fragrant.
Add chicken breast cubes and stir for 30 seconds. Add Shaoxing wine, soy sauce, oyster sauce, salt, sugar, and ground white pepper. Stir until chicken is no longer pink.

Pour water into the pan and bring to a boil, add goji berries and mix well. Reduce heat and simmer for 5 minutes until chicken is fully cooked and tender. Pour the corn starch solution and stir to thicken the sauce. Turn off heat, add thinly sliced scallions and gently toss to mix well. Transfer to a serving plate and serve with steamed white rice.
ingredients: 2 inch ginger, peeled and cut into match sticks
500 gram skinless boneless chicken breast, cut into small cubes
corn starch solution (1/2 tablespoon corn starch + 1 tablespoon water)
title: Sesame Oil Chicken
